channel.title: CVE Feed for GhozyLab, Inc. -- Gallery Lightbox
channel.description: The latest CVEs for GhozyLab, Inc. -- Gallery Lightbox

item.title: CVE-2024-47623|2024-10-07T13:55:27.740Z -- ghozylab%2C%20inc. -- gallery%20lightbox
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in GhozyLab, Inc. Gallery Lightbox allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Gallery Lightbox: from n/a through 1.0.0.39.
